post.desc:
When you're so drunk, you forgot what your signature ability was. ü•¥ Anywho, the more I think about Suika's ability, the more I think "***Wait, isn't she pretty overpowered?***"

I've played with interpretative power ideas before like "*What if Flandre can destroy not only physical objects, but abstract concepts too ‚Äì like the fact that you're a H≈çrai Immortal?*" ‚Äì but Suika is exactly that. She can gather and scatter **anything**. Hell, I think she can even kill Mok≈ç and toss her across the Sanzu River if she wants to by scattering that status effect.
